verses.name: Acts 7:53
verses.text: Who have received the law by the disposition of angels, and have not kept it.

verses.name: Acts 7:54
verses.text: When they heard these things, they were cut to the heart, and they gnashed on him with their teeth.

verses.name: Acts 7:55
verses.text: But he, being full of the Holy Ghost, looked up stedfastly into heaven, and saw the glory of God, and Jesus standing on the right hand of God,

verses.name: Acts 7:56
verses.text: And said, Behold, I see the heavens opened, and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God.
